mcq.statement: Where are the tombs of Mader-e Millat Fatima Jinnah and Liaquat Ali Khan located?
mcq.one_liner: The tombs of Mader-e Millat Fatima Jinnah and Liaquat Ali Khan are located in **Jamshed Town, Karachi**.
